director.name: 伊恩·波佩斯库-戈波 Ion Popescu-Gopo

introduction: A few years before Kubrick in “2001”, although in a more farcical way, Ion Popescu-Gopo shows the evolution of a strange creature named man from the time he started to rub flint stones to nowadays when he has managed to split the atoms.Awards:Grand Prix for Animation (Karlovy Vary Film Festival, 1960)Fist Prize (San Francisco Film Festival, 1960)Mention (Oberhausen Film Festival, 1960)Merit Diploma (Edinburgh Film Festival, 1960)Honorary Diploma (Santiago Film Festival, 1960)Mention (Oberhausen Film Festival, 1960)Mention Montevideo Film Festival, 1960)
